[Spire of the Soul-Seers](/spireOfTheSoulSeers/) |quests = [The Man Who Waits](/theManWhoWaits/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Dyrwoodan Clothing (Deadfire){{!}}Dyrwoodan Clothing |weapon1 = Exceptional Rod (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional Rod |internalname = NPC_TD_Caedman_Azo |guid = 8e72e2b40-3e44-48af-8239-9f6b84bd9190 }} '''Caedman Azo''' is an [animancer](/animancer/) in {{poe1}} and {{poe2}}. He can be found on the lower floor of the [Sanitarium](/sanitarium/) in the [Brackenbury](/brackenbury/) district of [Defiance Bay](/defianceBay/) (near the south edge of the map, in the laboratory in the Patient Ward which you need [Ethelmoer](/ethelmoer/)'s permission to access). In Deadfire (assuming you didn't kill him in during [The Man Who Waits](/theManWhoWaits/)), he can be found at the [Spire of the Soul-Seers](/spireOfTheSoulSeers/) Rooftop, in [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/), though has no special interactions besides a few lines of dialogue. ## Background {{Description|A round-faced, balding man turns to face you. His upper lip is pulled upward slightly by his pointed nose, exposing his upper teeth when he scowls.}} {{Description|Beneath a familiar, pointed nose, Caedman Azo's grin achieves a careful balance between polite and sneering. His once-round face has grown gaunter since you last saw him.}} Caedman is one of the foremost minds in the sanitarium, Azo is a proud Dyrwoodan and a patriot. He combined his talents with a proclivity for showmanship, leading him to a daring attempt to solve [Waidwen's Legacy](/waidwensLegacy/) by creating new souls, proxies, and implanting them in the affected children. His public demonstration in [Copperlane](/copperlane/) was a catastrophic failure, however, leading to his withdrawal from the public eye and work. It was, as with most events, the work of [Thaos](/thaos/): The young hollowborn girl Azo planned to infuse with a soul was occupied by the Engwithan's soul, after he disabled the machine meant to put a proxy soul within. The graphic death of the girl, bashing herself to death against Azo's work, was an element of Thaos' plans. It wasn't until 2823 AI that he returned to his work, trying to solve the Legacy with renewed fervor. Against [Ethelmoer](/ethelmoer/)'s wishes, he used "volunteers" from among the patients to further his research, convinced that either an animancer will crack the Legacy, or nobody. However, he ruined their souls in the process. [Gram](/gram/) was particularly vulnerable, due to being mute, and Azo harvested ample amounts of soul essence from him, essentially hollowing the poor man out in his attempt to create proxies for affected children. ## Interactions ## ={{poe1}} = {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [The Man Who Waits](/theManWhoWaits/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [The Man Who Waits](/theManWhoWaits/): You can get him to give you access to the ''North Ward'' (where the dangerous patients are locked up), and confront him after talking to [Gram](/gram/) and learning that he was mutilated by Azo. If you do not promise Azo your silence, he will attack and drop [Azo's research journal](/azosResearchJournal/) and a copy of Gram's patient file. ## ={{poe2}} = {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = |none = |other = Appears in [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/), [Spire of the Soul-Seers](/spireOfTheSoulSeers/) Rooftop, if he is not killed during [The Man Who Waits](/theManWhoWaits/). }} ## Gallery Caedman Azo.png | Caedman Azo PoE I Sanatorium Dialog Screen Portrait_caedman_azo_convo.png ‎|
